name: Gunjan Verma
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

full_output.summary: A nal year B.Tech student specializing in Information Technology with a strong foundation in data structures and web development, seeking a challenging position to leverage my skills and contribute to innovative projects while gaining hands-on experience in the tech industry.

certifications.description: I have completed a web development course on Internshala. This course covered essential web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design principles. It also provided hands-on experience with popular frameworks and tools such as Bootstrap, enabling me to build dynamic and visually appealing websites. Through practical projects and assignments, I enhanced my skills in front-end development and gained a solid understanding of web development best practices.
certifications.title: Web Development

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Drowsiness Detection System
projects.description: Developed a real-time drowsiness detection system using YOLOv5 and Python. Integrated the system with a webcam for continuous monitoring and alert generation. Documented the project, including data preprocessing, model training, and system deployment processes.

projects.name: Weather Forecasting Application
projects.description: Developed a weather forecasting system using advanced Java to provide accurate and real-time weather updates. Implemented data retrieval from external APIs such as OpenWeatherMap. Utilized Java for data processing, analysis, and backend development.

projects.name: Online Job Portal using PHP
projects.description: Developed an online job portal to connect job seekers with employers. Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Integrated features for job posting, search functionality, and application management.

full_output.name: Gunjan Verma
